availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on September 6, 1814 in Russellville, Logan County, Kentucky. He was a dry goods merchant in his younger years. Norton Founded the Southern Bank in Russellville, Kentucky and became its first president in 1850. Norton died July 18, 1889 in Lexington, Fayetteville County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Samuel W. Thomas, "Norton, George Washington," in The Encyclopedia of Louisville, John E. Kleber, ed. (Lexington: The University Press of Kentucky, 2001), 659-660; * Find A Grave*, "George Washington Norton (January 14, 1811 - January 9, 1884), Memorial #1480496, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=14804296&ref=acom (accessed June 26, 2017).
